citations.narrative:
The records of animal sales indicate where animals were taken to for transportation but do not have the name and
address of the person/business that purchased the animals. Incomplete records don't allow APHIS officials to trace
animals for health reasons, if needed. Records of sales must have the name and address of the purchaser (of where the
animals went to).
***Correct by 4/15/2023.

There were excessive dusty cobwebs on the ceiling and corners of the building. Dusty cobwebs can cause unsanitary
conditions for the animals in the building. Ensure to maintain a more regular routine of cleaning dusty cobwebs off the
ceiling and corners in the building.
***Correct by 4/28/2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.75(b)(1)(iv) 
   
Records: Dealers and exhibitors. 
The records of animal sales indicate where animals were taken to for transportation but do not have the name and 
address of the person/business that purchased the animals.  Incomplete records don't allow APHIS officials to trace 
animals for health reasons, if needed.  Records of sales must have the name and address of the purchaser (of where the 
animals went to). 
***Correct by 4/15/2023. 
3.31(b) 
   
Sanitation. 
There were excessive dusty cobwebs on the ceiling and corners of the building.  Dusty cobwebs can cause unsanitary 
conditions for the animals in the building.  Ensure to maintain a more regular routine of cleaning dusty cobwebs off the 
ceiling and corners in the building.  
***Correct by 4/28/2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
 n
